pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hadamard Matrix Generation // Generates Hadamard matrices using different construction methods. For those who want to generate Hadamard matrix, a generic function, Hadamard_matrix() is provided. For those who want to generate Hadamard matrix using a particular method, separate functions are available. See Horadam (2007, ISBN:9780691119212) Hadamard Matrices and their applications, Princeton University Press for more information on Hadamard Matrices.
